title: Creation of Deformable Template
body:
Hi,
I have some difficulties using train_template.py for unconditional templates. The error is as follows:
TypeError: Cannot convert a symbolic Keras input/output to a numpy array. This error may indicate that you're trying to pass a symbolic value to a NumPy call, which is not supported. Or, you may be trying to pass Keras symbolic inputs/outputs to a TF API that does not register dispatching, preventing Keras from automatically converting the API call to a lambda layer in the Functional Model.
I guess the problem might be the LocalParamWithInput layer, but I don't know how to fix it.
Thanks for your help.
